name: AstroBase
description:
You are the last ship left at AstoBase Alpha. While the other ships have left to gather supplies, it is your job to protect the base. But now, waves of enemy ships have locked onto your location, and are coming to destroy the base.

A/D or Arrow Keys to turn your ship

W or Up Arrow to move

Space bar to fire

My High Score is 135. See if you can beat it!
